A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Plot holes. Dozens and dozens of plot holes.

Wasted characters. (ie. Snoke\, Phasma\, Finn)

Rey is even more of a Mary Sue.

Luke would never\, no matter how old a crotchety he gets\, almost murder his nephew in his sleep.

Lack of respect for SW mythos. Jedi can now fly through space and shoot lightning decades after their death.

The list goes on and on. I was so disappointed in this movie.
